Severl issues around thread/frame updating synchronization have been fixed 
since the build this error occurred in. The error here is simply logged, and 
processing continues. We could do a better job, to avoid logging the error.


Deferred

Actuall I've looked more closely how this happens.
It happends when eclipse is shuting down and AssertionError
is thrown. I do have exception breakpoint set for both
caught and uncaught assertion errors. But instead of assertion
exception being caught as breakpoint the Event Queue thread
falls into a strange state. It looks like it is totally
out of sync. Eclipse as debugger reports it running but
does show the stack trace. When I hit Run / Suspend it remains
in a running state according to icons in debug view (does
not matter if I stop event queue thread or whole VM). When
I hit Resume it shows itself as stopped but fails to retrieve
state. I don't know if this helps or you can repro it.

Leo

Please try the latest build when it is available (I20040615-2000). It has some 
synchronization fixes in it. The build is showing as red X's, but it's just 
some tests that did not compile.
As well, if you have exact steps to reproduce, please list them explicitly.
Closing. Please re-open if still a problem.
